InstantiationError().Description: Constructs an InstantiationError with no detail message.

InstantiationError(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs an InstantiationError with the specified detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown when an application tries to use the Java new construct to instantiate an abstract class or an interface. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can only occur at run time if the definition of a class has incompatibly changed.
